body.name: 500 Pack White Beverage Paper Napkins, 1 Ply Cocktail Napkins, For Restaurant, Bar or Home use
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 57 mins
features: FOR ALL BEVERAGES: Serve with any beverage, such as water, juice, coffee, tea, or cocktails. Suitable for in the hospitality industry, and these napkins are perfect for bars, coffee shops, and restaurants, or events
PROTECT SURFACES: Using a beverage napkin underneath your glasses will help prevent condensation from running onto bars, tabletops or table cloths
DISPOSABLE AND CONVENIENT: As a one-time use item, these napkins offer convenience and time savings by eliminating the need to wash fabric napkins

SOLID WHITE, PROTECT SURFACES: Impress guests with stylish and put together place settings. These white beverage napkins bring an elegant and classic appearance to any table setting. Using a beverage napkin underneath your glasses will help prevent condensation from running onto bars, tabletops or table cloths
PERFECTLY SIZED: At 4.75 Inches when folded they fit neatly into most bar caddies.
body.description: White Beverage Napkins by Crystalware These White 1-Ply Beverage Napkins add a crisp and polished appearance to any table setting. They great single-ply napkins, giving them maximum durability and absorbability. They are perfect for use with a variety of beverages such as cocktails, juice, coffee, or tea. They are disposable, they minimize clean up and are an affordable alternative to coasters or saucers. Able to protect tabletops and other surfaces from condensation on glasses, while keeping your hands dry, these napkins are perfect for any culinary occasion and are the perfect size with folded dimensions of 4.75" x 4.75". Product Features FOR ALL BEVERAGES: Serve with any beverage, such as water, juice, coffee, tea, or cocktails. Suitable for in the hospitality industry, and these napkins are perfect for bars, coffee shops, and restaurants, or events DISPOSABLE AND CONVENIENT: As a one-time use item, these napkins offer convenience and time savings by eliminating the need to wash fabric napkins SOLID WHITE: Impress guests with stylish and put together place settings. These white beverage napkins bring an elegant and classic appearance to any table setting PROTECT SURFACES: Using a beverage napkin underneath your glasses will help prevent condensation from running onto bars, tabletops or table cloths PERFECTLY SIZED: At 4.75 Inches when folded they fit neatly into most bar caddies What customers are saying about the Crystalware Beverage napkins “Great price for so many napkins! They are perfect for any occasion. Not too thin, just right. Very happy with this purchase...”Kristin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: These napkins were exactly what I was looking for. I own a retail store and we offer coffee & tea to our customers. I needed a white beverage napkin to have for our customers. These are actually hard to find where I live. The price was just right and they do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Bev Nap
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for my needs; soft; attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were good napkins for the price. They were very thin, but as expected for small cocktail napkins. I would buy again if I had an event that required cocktail napkins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bar napkins, size and durability. Will reorder!
reviews.reviewText: Needed diverging plain and simple while being durable for the bar. Perfect under a glass of wine or wrapped around a bottle of beer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and lightweight--fine for cocktails, probably
reviews.reviewText: When my local stores ran out of napkins at the start of the pandemic, I was scrambling to find replacements. I didn't read the description as closely as I should have--for the price, I was expecting dinner napkins of a higher quality, not thin cocktail napkins. When Costco got napkins back in stock, I got a significantly higher quantity and quality for just a few dollars more than these. Fine if you want something to put under your cocktail glass, but not useful for dinner napkins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very Thin and Flimsy
reviews.reviewText: These napkins are very thin and flimsy, no wonder they were so cheap. I ordered these for an event and they were fine, but it you are looking for something nice I would not recommend these napkins. Pay a little more for 2-ply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic cocktail napkins at a great price
reviews.reviewText: We ordered these for our home wedding and they worked as well as we could have hoped. For the price an excellent buy. We so many left over we can use them for many more events.
